AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: scalemen hybrid, short
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description:
A genetically modified human. Either through gene therapy or environmental pressure this kind of human has developed a think leathery skin. Scalemen are slightly slower and tire quicker than normal humans but they are highly adapted to hot biomes, need less food and have some natural armor. 
<size=16>Gameplay:</size> 
Hybrid stats are mostly averaged between Zetas and the hybrid's orginal race minus a few balance expections. 
Hybrid skill learning factor and research speed stats are docked below this 50/50 average on normally stated races and set at 1.1 and 1.2 respectively (Rather then a 1.25 average)
